revised_title: Spectrum Analysis of Tm III in CaF\lt;sub\gt;2\lt;/sub\gt;
tldr: The author investigates the energy levels and optical spectrum of Tm III ions in CaF2. They analyze the crystal field data and compare it with paramagnetic resonance data to determine the magnetic hyperfine constant and spin-orbit coupling. The results suggest that the values for free divalent ions are only about 1 to 2% greater than those for the atoms.
